attributes.additional_details: They meet to tax, destroy you and take all of your taxes they want to make you poor and are undemocratic billionaires who dictate to try and control a one world government. Members have included the OH SO POPULAR Tony Blair, George Osborne and many others your taxes pay for the weekend despite the net worth of all the people meeting on that day being approximately $1 Trillion
attributes.background: The Bilderberg Group, Bilderberg conference, Bilderberg meetings or Bilderberg Club is an annual private conference of 120 to 150 people of the European and North American political elite, experts from industry, finance, academia, and the media.
